title: Why I Didn’t Let My 2-Year-Old Buy a Toy at Target
description: Last Thursday, Kaitlynn (our 17-year-old) took Micah (our 2-year-old) with her to Target. He was so excited to be going on a little outing with her. But about 20 minutes later, my phone started ringing. It was a FaceTime call… and on the other end of the screen was a very distraught Micah, full-on sobbing.Read More
author: Crystal Paine
